Acculete Fitness

Freelance branding and logo design. Collaboration with VeeVee creative studio.

service
Logo Design
location
Hudson, Quebec
Previous Next

Goal: Fitness logo with two main themes: data driven progress (strength of the mind) and athleticism (strength of the body).

Process: I started by having a conversation with Vanessa from VeeVee Creative Studio about an overall vision for the brand. After getting a good idea of the direction we wanted to go, I began sketching logo concepts. I used the main values we wanted to promote (fitness + measured, data driven progress) as a foundation for the designs. I always start by designing a logo in black and white for maximum usability.

Final Product: After three rounds of logo drafts with the client and finalizing the icon we provided a brand guide which included an official typeface and use of colour.
